pros: Snake-printed nubuck leather uppers with round toe
Easy slip-on with double side goring
Comes in black Thai snake, blush Vienna snake, light grey/silver foil snake, multi, navy woven, red multi embroidered denim, sand/gold foil snake nubuck and snare grey Thai snake
Leather lining, cushioned footbed, added arch support
cons: May run large, so keep this in mind when sizing

customer_reviews.title: Pass On All The Other Brands -- Buy These!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the look of these slip-on tennies. I tried Vans but they were too heavy. Then I tried Steve Maddens but they were too uncomfortable. I own 3 pairs of Sofft sandals so was happy to see they had this style. I ordered them and am SOOO happy that I did. I walked all over Spain & Portugal for 1 month in them. No blisters, no sore feet -- PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Camp

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: The shoe had a strange fit. It was fine in the forefoot region but really big in the heel. Had to return it. Definitely go a half size smaller. Also bought it from houser shoes. They do not have free returns. If I knew that beforehand, would not have ordered from them.
customer_reviews.author: Chifa

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand, because of the arch support. These shoes are super comfortable and Sofft is the only slip on shoe that i can wear comfortably due to my high arches. The quality seems good, but after a few weeks they do crease from wear very noticeably - I was hoping they wouldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I don't think they have good grip at all
customer_reviews.text: I don't care for the soles of these shoes. Even though they are "rubber" they slip on hardwood floors. I don't think they have good grip at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Haynes Gallucci

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Cute Summer shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these the minute I saw them. Great price, great shoes. I normally wear a 9M but these were a little long. The 8.5 fits perfect! Am enjoying these and they really get the compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Crabb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes! Very comfy and a staple in my spring wardrobe! (Had for a month)
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Heller

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They have a really weird look when wearing -- the front is really long.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have problem feet. These shoes fit great and are very comfortable. They absolutely go with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. Bought a second pair. Lots of compliments. Easy and casual. Very very comfortable. I walked miles around town or malls.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moro

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were comfortable right out of the box. They're great with so many things for summer. I've worn them a lot already. Great for walking, shopping, and just hanging out. And I love the gray color...a great neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Springs

customer_reviews.title: Runs Large
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe, however it ran large. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: The fit is a true fit
customer_reviews.text: I love them they are so comfortable they really feel good An can be worn all day An my feet never hurts
customer_reviews.author: Janess Parker

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe last year and wore them a lot; perfect to work in if you are on your feet all day! I bought this new pair so I could have one to use for good and one to run around in. Really cute and comfortable shoes. I always get compliments when I wear them. I highly recommend this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bockewitz

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit , I returned
customer_reviews.text: This brand is wonderful but these didn’t fit and so I returned
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Wood

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: Way too narrow in the toe box, but the shoes were beautiful. Loved the embroidered flowers on the denim.
customer_reviews.author: DSW

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and style. I have the same shoe in black and blue. My blue ones are really worn so I decided to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: CodyGirltoo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are SO comfy and i love them!! Wanting another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! This is my 3rd pair. They are so comfortable and great for long distance walking!!
customer_reviews.author: P.M.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Sofft makes a very high quality and comfortable shoe. This is my 4th pair. I just had to have the distressed blue for spring!
customer_reviews.author: Doodle D

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: Runs large - needed an 8 - usually wear 8.5 or 9. Very comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.author: tbiytc

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: These Sofft shoes are my favorite! Incredibly comfortable and no heel blisters. For size reference, I did size down 1/2 size as I do with all Sofft sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: mary margaret

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have a difficult time finding shoes in stores that are comfortable. I can't believe I ordered this on-line and it fit perfect, and is probably the most comfortable casual shoe I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Ann from Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Look good but has a hard innersole....you need to buy your own for these to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Order Half Size Smaller
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in my true size but ended up returning for a half size smaller. Probably would have fit if I was going to wear with real socks but because of the cut I would probably wear them with thin "no-show" socks. Extremely comfortable and really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were tight and too small. No free returns too. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth rees

customer_reviews.title: Happy Shopping!
customer_reviews.text: Size up!!! Cute shoe but it did take quite sometime to receive my refund which is not the norm for Amazon. The shoes are cute and worth the price. Unfortunately, they didn't fit me. As pictured and described. Happy Shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy and reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute shoes!! In fact if I hadn't really wanted them I probably wouldn't have reordered after UPS destroyed or lost the first pair. Can't wait to wear them with white jeans.
customer_reviews.author: MathMaven

customer_reviews.title: Check Your Size
customer_reviews.text: I hate it because this was a wonderful casual shoe which ran large and now they are out of stock! I am disappointed because these shoes are perfect for my daily errands and activities.
customer_reviews.author: Pia Pate

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: really like them, for my foot i wish they were a bit wider...
customer_reviews.author: LTS

customer_reviews.title: ... ankles but I have friends who have these and love them!
customer_reviews.text: I returned because I could tell they were going to rub my ankles but I have friends who have these and love them!
customer_reviews.author: AMD

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size down!
customer_reviews.text: I always wear a size 8 in every shoe I buy, but when these arrived, they were too big in the heel area like other reviewers said. I send them back and exchanged for a 7.5. Got them today and they fit perfectly! Don’t think twice about it, order a half size down!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sparkly shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love my sparkly new shoes! I generally love the Söfft brand of shoes, and these are no exception. Comfortable with good support and cute as well.
customer_reviews.author: m.hewes

product_meta.title: Sofft - Womens - Somers
product_meta.description: An on-trend sporty slip-on with exotic texture.
